location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 47 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Encloses (some included) correspondence regarding the capture of the ship Nassreh Shah[Nāṣirah Shāh?] and the hostile proceedings of the Imam of Muscat against the Shaikh of Bushire for the consideration of Government. Enclosures comprise of replies from Stannus to Mohamed Zakee Khan [Muḥammad Zakī Khān] (ff. 14-15) and His Royal Highness the Prince of Shiraz (f. 15), dated 10 August 1826.
